plugin.name: autodetect
plugin.description: Plugin contains auto-detection plugins for video/audio outputs

element.name: autoaudiosink
element.description: Audio sink embedding the Auto-settings for audio output

element.name: autovideosink
element.description: Video sink embedding the Auto-settings for video output
